analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/28/0xc654e03b41a50ce46c225f5692664f9f984feabc.sol:
	Contract SixthBountyWPTpayoutPart01 has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0xc654e03b41a50ce46c225f5692664f9f984feabc.sol#53-56)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

SixthBountyWPTpayoutPart01.makePayout (/unique_chucks/28/0xc654e03b41a50ce46c225f5692664f9f984feabc.sol#73-83) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-company_token.mint(addressOfBountyMembers[i],bountyMembersAmounts[addressOfBountyMembers[i]]) (/unique_chucks/28/0xc654e03b41a50ce46c225f5692664f9f984feabc.sol#77-83)

SixthBountyWPTpayoutPart01.makePayout has external calls inside a loop:
